website_summaries.verdict: Creates gorgeous swirls on your sourdough loaves. But be sure to keep this bowl well-floured.
pros: Wicker draws out moisture for a firm crust.Consider "seasoning" with rice flour or bread flour before using
cons: Watch for splintering near the nails
If you find some, clip them off

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality (buy 2)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bread making. I recommend buying more than one. One is not enough for most bread recipes. You will need two and these are great quality
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Clean, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Have made a half dozen loaves already! Well constructed, with very few little slivers to pull out.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 2nd proofing
customer_reviews.text: I work with a very wet sour dough RYE thus I NEED a liner too. Before doing my 2nd proofing I dust the liner with rice flour to prevent sticking to the liner. Fantastic 2nd proofing, rise & shaping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matti T Vertti

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. The cloth bit seems a bit cheap, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: frederick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! The size is just about right
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The size is just about right, and the quality so far is superb. The seller followed up with an email to make sure I was satisfied with the product, so it seems like they really do care! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Seth A

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does its job - too small for the rustic breads I bake.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tagger

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these Bread Baskets. Perfect Value!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were in a kitchen store where they sold baskets similar to these and the price was $75 each. I said I'm sure I can get these on Amazon cheaper so I scanned the UPC and sure enough these popped up as a similar item and when they arrived they were just as good as the super expensive ones. The bread rises very nicely in these and I wouldn't hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: karyn almeida

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but don't get it wet. If you do, mold will form on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Big Len

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This proofing basket makes it a lot easier to have rustic artisan bread at home.
customer_reviews.author: Faraz shahbazi

customer_reviews.title: A desired gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, and the receiver was delighted - just what she wanted for her pending bread baking adventure.
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Great Proofing Basket
customer_reviews.text: A great round proofing basket. Its a little large, but it works for my sourdough loaves.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time & love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great basket! This is my 5th basket in my collection for sourdough bread baking.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Brucato

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I used it already several times.
customer_reviews.author: Maike

product_meta.title: Happy Sales HSPB-85WL, Round Proofing Basket Banneton Brotform 8.5 Inch w/LINER ¡¦
product_meta.description: Size:8.5" Round w/ LinerRattan banneton is great for proofing your bread. These are also known as "brotforms" or "proofing baskets". These baskets are used both to provide the loaf with shape and to wick moisture from the crust. When dough is risen, turn it out onto a pan to bake. The loaf will sport a gorgeous pattern of floury rings circling the deep-golden crust. Measures approximately 8.5 inches in diameter at the top, 5.5 inches in diameter at the bottom. Height is about 3.25 to 3.5 inches.
feature_bullets: ✔PREMIUM QUALITY BANNETON BASKET: Our brotforms 8.5 inch are exceptionally well constructed and traditionally shaped. Specially designed for professionals. It also makes the perfect gift for friends and family.
ECO-FRIENDLY - Made from 100% no chemical natural cane - Our brotform is environmentally friendly.
SAFE TO USE - Our brotforms are manufactured in compliance with the German LFGB Daily Use and Feed Code
DURABLE & RESISTANT: Hand crafted bread mold and made of high quality natural cane measures over 8MM in diameter, which is thicker and stronger than the material used by many competitors.
